nodes.bodyText: it's probably OK, and likely better/clearer, to simply always use LOG.info() instead of debug() to replace System.out.println() in tests. In "real" (non-test) code, it's... not always super obvious which level is right. But, hopefully, you won't find any System.out.println() in non-test code?

Yes, no System.out  in a non-test folder.
Replacing all of them with LOG.info :)
-thanks
Manthan
